description:
Layer upon layer of mysteries shroud the Kabuto family. Each question answered only brings more confusion. Meanwhile, Stroheim cares only about his promised duel with Juzo Kabuto--even more than his debt to Dr. Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shame! The grave sin of the Kabuto family exposed!
慙愧! 暴かれる兜家の大罪!
